review: I know Dr Krishnakali Chatterjee since 2013 . Besides being a very good Doctor , she is also a very friendly  & a nice person. She treats & cures her patients with love , care & skill.

I was apprehensive at first for changing to a different dentist as my previous dentist is not available anymore. ButI  am very satisfied with the behaviour and friendliness of the doctor and also the staff. The ambience is great, it is clean and hygienic, all precautions have been taken to avoid COVID 19. I am really satisfied with the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I was under the treatment of Dr Krishnakali. I found her to be super friendly and professional. At every stage she explained the treatment and was kind enough to accomodate me in her schedule when I got stuck in calcutta's slow traffic.
Staff were friendly and hygine at the clinic was spot on. Would definitely visit again, highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental X-Ray,Surgical Extractions of Teeth,
review:
During the Pandemic situation when I faced my dental problems, I searched online for good dentists near me, and I came to know about Whitezone clinic. Very Polite behaviour praised me and my husband too. Extremely maintained hygiene took the fear out of us during this kind of situation. 
Dr. Krishnakali Chatterjee treated us with her best efforts and now me and my husband both are smiling with Painless teeth.

context: Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
The Doctor is very polite and friendly.
Both the doctors have explained my problem, cause of the problem, diagnosis and treatment procedure in detail.
I have gone through the treatment procedure,and till now it seems to be very effective.
Both the doctors and other members of the clinic are very cooperative and polite. They take care of the patient very well.o

Doctor have explained me my problems clearly n the treatment for those. I had missing teeth n lower left side for which I ws adviced fr fixed bridge. Since I m gng out f town within 3 days doctor delivered my bridge the very next day.
I can chew properly nw

Visited doctor for missing teeth n both my upper n lower left side. Dr. Krishnakali clearly explained the possible treatment fr me. Treatment ws started on the same day. No pain no sensitivity no discomfort. I ws adviced fr computer made crowns wch r really precise n light n weight. Thank you Dr n white zone team fr all our support

I have been consulting with DRs of White Zone regularly since 2013 and I am really benefitted by their sincere treatment.The denture provided is also very fitting and trouble free.I recommend others also to come for treatment in White Zone.The Drs here are very friendly

The overall treatment process was good,basically the embience of the clinic is very nice and the behavior of the doctors too, I had recommended so many members from my family.I hope that after the completion of this treatment also I would not face any problem as before and expect more cooperation from the entire team..
Best wishes for its future..
